author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: I could put a tracker on it and then compare its track to wind and currents. Will I get paid for this valuable research?

author: Rick Spilman
content: DO they keep a log of the log? The local boats appear to keep track of it to avoid a collision. I don’t know if there is a designated log log keeper.

author: Peter Wright
content: Do they keep a log of its position?

author: Doug Bostrom
content: Next time we pass a deadhead we’ll salute and dip the pennant. Seniority deserves respect. ðŸ™‚

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: We need to know what type of tree it is so we can use that long lasting wood for marina piles ðŸ™‚
